description:
This course is intended for those who are tired of working a 9 to 5 job, fed up with not being able to make an impact with people, and have a fear of not creating a legacy.

For those of you who dare to take the first step, what lies ahead for you is a roadmap to creating your personal fortune, empire, and brand. This is meant for those just starting, with no experience, and just want to see that there is another way to make a living. This course will give you the tools you need to take your life to another level.

No longer will you make a living, but you will begin to make a life. 

Can you imagine your books being read by thousands, maybe millions?

Can you imagine being able to see your bank account being filled while sitting on a beach?

Can you imagine getting a phone call from someone who's life you saved from writing your book?

All of these are possible with the right mindsets, actions, and advice.

I lay out for you the mindsets and practices I've done and found useful when I began as a no name author. 

With a strong desire, passion, and dream, walk this road with me and let us begin to change the world one reader at a time.
title: Insights to Building a Kindle Empire
